full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): ` MYUR MDZAD YE SHES KYI MGON PO LA KHRUS GSOL CHO GA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @005A *, ,(CES MYUR MDZAD YE SHES KYI MGON PO LA ZHUS GSOL BA'I CHO GA 'DI NI ^DGE SLONG BLO BZANG DAR RGYAS KYIS RANG GIS BZHENGS PA'I MGON  KHONG GI RTEN LA DMIGS NAS AER TE NI PAndE TA NO MANG HAN 'JAM DPAL RDO RJE MDZAD PA'I DPAL MGON ZHAL BZHI'I KHRUS CHO GA LA BRTEN NAS CHOS ZLA BA'I LAR PHYOGS KYI RGYAL BA GNYES PAR NGES DON BSTAN PA RAB TU DAR BA'I GLING DU SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI BSOD NAMS DBANG PHYUG GO ,BKRA SHIS DPAL 'BAR 'DZAM GLING RGYAN DU BYON, ,DGE'O, ,)
